channel.title: LoginServer - Multiple Worlds
channel.description: Could someone please explain to me how a LoginServer actually works? I'm not wanting like a diagram, I understand that part. What I'm wanting to know is the networking aspect of it, and how to set one up to have proper support for multiple game worlds.

item.title: LoginServer - Multiple Worlds
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Could probably use a REST API and a framework like Ruby on Rails to handle things like that. Just have the server keep track of sessions. Sounds like something fun that I’d be willing to do. HMMMMM

POST /sessions
  :username
  :password

Returns ->

{
  settings : {
   "key" : "value"
  }
}

Drawbacks:

  • Slower than writing a custom protocol.

Benefits:

  • Easy to work with
